attributes.action: instruct all local authorities to re-open all closed public toilets; and also to staff them so that none have to be closed due to vandalism.  If this is not possible perhaps all buildings to which the public have access (with the possible exception of shops) could be istructed to make their toilets available on request
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For a very long time health experts have said we should drink 2 litres of water per day; the obvious corollary of this is increased need to go to the toilet but with so many public toilets having closed where are we supposed to go to do this?  I go all over London and frequently find myself desperately searching for a toilet; meanwhile I pass any number of public PHONE BOXES in an era when nearly everyone has a mobile phone!  Which is more necessary?
